Package clientSide.gui

Class DepartmentManagerAccountScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.controllers.AbstractScreen
      • clientSide.gui.DepartmentManagerAccountScreenController
  • public class DepartmentManagerAccountScreenController
extends AbstractScreen
    The DepartmentManagerAccountScreenController class manages the interactions within the department manager's account screen in the GoNature application. It facilitates various operations. This class extends AbstractScreen for UI control. It utilizes GoNatureUsersController for user management and ParkController for park-related operations, ensuring that department managers can effectively oversee and manage park data and reports.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DepartmentManagerAccountScreenController

        public DepartmentManagerAccountScreenController()
        Initializes a new instance of the DepartmentManagerAccountScreenController. It sets up the necessary controller instances for user and park operations, facilitating the management of department-specific functionalities within the application.

        void getCurrenetCapacities​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Parameters:
        event - When the 'Current Capacity' button is pressed, the department manager will see a pop-up screen with the current capacity according to park parameters at the DB

      • logOut

        void logOut​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Logs out the department manager when the 'Log Out' button is pressed. This method updates the 'isLoggedIn' status in the database and redirects the user to the main screen of the application.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent triggered by pressing the 'Log Out' button.
        Throws:
        CommunicationException - If there is a communication issue with the server during the logout process.

      • getGreeting

        private java.lang.String getGreeting()
        Returns:
        A greeting according to the current time of the day

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method is automatically invoked after the FXML has been loaded, setting up the initial state of the UI components. It prepares the Department Manager's account screen by loading the user's data, setting greeting text, updating the title, fetching and displaying the parks managed by the department manager, and applying styles to UI elements.
        Specified by:
        initialize in class AbstractScreen

      • loadBefore

        public void loadBefore​(java.lang.Object information)
        Description copied from class: AbstractScreen
        This method is called if a screen has to get information before it is shown.
        Specified by:
        loadBefore in class AbstractScreen
        Parameters:
        information - The DepartmentManager object passed from the logIn screen, containing the manager's details.
